reviews.review: Um bom jogo coop pra jogar com seu amigo burro.
Esse jogo é muito bom recomendo

I like the in-depth story (and the fact that the community test chambers serve as a post-game) and
the physics are amazing. i have had this game for possibly two years and GlaDOS' voice never gets old (and y'know PotaTOS)
Meilleur concept de jeu à ma connaissance.

史低的时候入手极佳。
十分有趣的解密游戏，还可以和小伙伴一起玩，自己设计关卡，社区很多大佬设计的地图也十分有趣
这个游戏的氛围营造是v社作品中我最喜欢的

게임도 넘 재밌지만 글라도스 캐릭터 진짜 너무 쩔어.. 사랑해 글라도스... 
싫어하는 대상한테 노래 만들어서 불러주기 있음?? 그것도 두 곡이나?? 게다가 가는 길 심심하지 말라고 동행 큐브까지 준다?? 이게 사랑이 아니면 뭐니?

Oyunu daha önceden arkadaşımdan oynamıştım. Ancak o steam'den indirmediği için co-op yoktu. Artık co-op oynama imkanım var ama oynayacak arkadaşım yok. Rastgele seçimdede biri çıkmıyor. Onun dışında çok iyi!

jogo de puzzle legal.

compra e bom e tem coop online

O jogo tem uma historia bem legal, tem muitos puzzles desafiadores pra pensar em como passar de level. bastante divertido.

Es ist ein geiles game zum Rätseln.

игра говно тупая пацаны играйте в кс

Um jogo praticamente PERFEITO, uma história que te deixa de queixo caído, uma trilha sonora de se apaixonar facilmente, e uma dublagem excelente. Nada do que reclamar desse jogo, minha nota é : 100/10.
игра топ сюжетка топ  кооп топ
игра топ, 10 из 10. это игра стоит своих денег. жалка только что совмеску и одиночку можно спокойно пройти за часа 4. Компания маленькая, но очень крута сделаная.
Great game, the puzzles are hard and not overly complicated.
当年在 xbox360 上玩儿的，世界上最牛逼解谜游戏。

跟朋友一起買了這款遊戲
真的是不到一個禮拜就把它全部玩完
謎題設計得很詳細，劇情以及題材也引人入勝

真的不用後悔買這款遊戲，不論是跟朋友一起玩，或是自己無聊的時候也可以玩！
Coop в этой игре лучшее что было с головоломками
又益智又解压，关卡设计非常巧妙，脑洞非常之大，让人欲罢不能，1和2的捆绑包只要4元，2代还有双人模式，社区实验室还有好多好多图，感觉要常驻在我电脑里了。
买不了吃亏买不了上当

Resumidamente, me encanta, es sin lugar a duda mi juego favorito (y es que aunque tenga sólo 91 horas en esta cuenta, ya lo había jugado bastante anteriormente). En lo personal me parece súper divertido, tiene bromas inocentes y crueles, tiene el balance perfecto entre un juego cómico y dramático, así como sus momentos de tensión. La historia es llevada de una gran manera y con una atmósfera inmersiva, con uno de los villanos más amados de todos los videojuegos (sin exagerar). Y eso que aún no hablo de su modo Coop, un gran añadido que hacer el juego aún más disfrutable. Lo siento si soy algo Fanboy, pero de verdad me encanta.

One of the best puzzle games I've ever played. Really well designed levels. The awesome narrative and the voice acting is just icing on the cake. I can't recommend this game enough. Even if you are not into puzzle/narrative games, I'll still say it's worth checking out.
One of the greatest puzzle ever!
Characters, story and unique gameplay make this a must-see classic.
I like the main story so far and the puzzles are really cool but where this game shines is that cool ass co op mode on it had quite a bit of fun with friends on it.
its an amazing complex lore filled puzzle game you can play with your friends!
nothing makes me feel like this game does. it is incredible.
es hermoso vale cada centavo  primero  jugga  el  1

-Советую игру к прохождению как в одиночке, так и с другом,

-Игра заставит вас задуматься и кстати на неплохое такое время,

-Сюжет игры интересен и бывает иногда сложно понять,что от тебя требуется,

-Конец не плохой , как и начало.
its challenging and fun, as well as just a timeless classic within this genre of gaming

Portal 2 is an absolutely fantastic game! I initially bought this to play co-op with a friend, and had a blast with it, but then later went back to the story mode and am enjoying it as well! Great voice acting, a convincing and well-modeled world, and an amazing physics engine make this game stand out.

No loi recomiendo si tienes baja autoestima, jugue el copetaribo con mi amigo y Glad0s me dijo cosas feitas, igual estaba re b uena
A genuine masterpiece and one of the greatest games ever made.
Jeu de puzzles très fun, encore plus en co-op !
